description: This file sets up an asynchronous agent using the 'Agent' class with a specific 'Claude' model, and runs an asynchronous response printing method for a horror story prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class used to interact with the Claude model asynchronously.

classes.name: RunResponseEvent
classes.description: Represents an event in the response stream from the agent.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A model class representing the Claude AWS model.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Method to run a prompt asynchronously and get a stream of response events.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Method to asynchronously print the response to the terminal.
